column5: Just got back from a week with the family and friends at beautiful Stony Lake, great weather, with some awsome moon lit nights. We caught several small to medium bass, LM and SM, a couple of walleye, including a beauty 23"er (she went back of course) The Walleye in the picture took a "shallow Raider" muskie bait (must have been hungry). Then On Tuesday night under a full moon we were trolling a deep channel with a smaller bait, looking for walleye(s) when this girl smashed on to the seen  ....sorry about the goofy look on my face, I was a little freaked out.  It took about 10 minutes for her to get back into it, but she swam away after some TLC at boat side. A quick measure, she was about 45" ...a PB for me.
Very nice As for the big smile. Who wouldn't be grinning ear to ear.

very nice walleye you got there Grog. Ive fished Stoney more than a few times myself. I find the Walleye are very hard to come by, but then again its proably my technique. Thats also one heck of a Muskie. Very nice. Be careful out there at night!!
Thankyou, guys it sure was an exciting evening.
congrats on the pb - nice fish
Great report. Congrats on the PB, beauty musky.
A walleye on a Muskie lure, and a Muskie on a Walleye lure...?  Nice 45"
stony at night a brave man i would say lol, nice fish great job  dont forget to stop in and have a beer with ronny hawkins
Awesome going sounds like a great time away. Congrats on the PB don't worry about the crazy face just start doing them in every picture
Hooking into muskies at night is a blast and you got a real nice one there, congrats on getting your PB
Congrats on your PB..must have been fun bringing her to the boat under a full moon.
beauty muskie, stony lake is a great lake.. real dangerous at night haha
Congrats on the nice Stony lake walleye and Musky!...I agree that stony lake could be dangerous at night... You need a good chart plotter to navigate around all the rock shoals...

....as for the night danger thing, I agree, however in this case we trolled in a specific area right close to the cottage, clear access to and fro. Also with the full moon and clear sky it was quite easy to see were we were going. There was some thought involved, and it paid off big time. Thank you for the congrats people....
Well done some very nice fish !!! Congrats on your PB !!!!! Tight-lines
